column1: first of all we find the outliers
trimming: trimming is a technique where we remove the outliers from the data
it is used  when the outliers are less in the data
but when the outliers are more in the data so we used capping
tapping : is a technique where we handle the outlier by using the upper limit value and lower limit value
those value which is greter than upper limit so we replace  these value by upper limit
and those value which is smaller than the lower limit value so this value replace by lowerlimit
